pkgmetadata.longdescription: Get Executing Script's Path // Determine the path of the executing script. Compatible with a few popular GUIs: 'Rgui', 'RStudio', 'VSCode', 'Jupyter', and 'Rscript' (shell). Compatible with several functions and packages: 'source()', 'sys.source()', 'debugSource()' in 'RStudio', 'testthat::source_file()', 'knitr::knit()', 'compiler::loadcmp()', and 'box::use()'.
